snippet: With riot police protecting the players, Ghana advanced to the Africa Cup of Nations final with a 3-0 win over host Equatorial Guinea.
abstract: Ghana beats Equatorial Guinea, 3-0, advancing to final in Africa Cup of Nations.
lead_paragraph: With riot police protecting the players, Ghana advanced to the Africa Cup of Nations final with a 3-0 win over host Equatorial Guinea.

headline.main: Ghana Advances to Final in Africa Cup
headline.print_headline: Ghana Advances to Final in Africa
